inclusion.criterion: paired noninvasive tests (blood tests, TE, and CT/enhanced CT) and gastroscopy within 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The nature of the present study was explained to all patients and informed consent was obtained from each case
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe ascites that might significantly hamper the accurate assessment of LSM
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: obesity (body mass index>35kg/m2) or intercostal space was too narrow
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe cardiopulmonary diseases, renal failure, acute illness, infectious diseases, acute liver failure or cholestasis or hepatic congestion
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: malignant tumors or other serious medical diseases (such as hepatocellular carcinoma, gastric cancer, pancreatic cancer and colon cancer) that may reduce expected survival time
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: non-cirrhotic portal hypertension and those with portal vein thrombosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: previous or ongoing treatment for portal hypertension, spleen diameter<4cm or splenectomy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pregnant women and patients with implanted pacemakers
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients can not cooperate with the endoscopy, CT/enhanced CT, FibroTouch /FibroScan and other related examination
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, recent admission for UGIB due to NSAID gastritis. He is being treated with lactulose for hepatic encephalopathy and has an increase in total and direct bilirubin since last visit.
